snippet: The Bloomberg administration says that requiring food stamp applicants to be fingerprinted reduces fraud, but the City Council speaker, Christine C. Quinn, said it was punitive.
lead_paragraph: The Bloomberg administration says that requiring food stamp applicants to be fingerprinted reduces fraud, but the City Council speaker, Christine C. Quinn, said it was punitive.

headline.main: Fingerprinting Those Seeking Food Stamps Is Denounced
headline.print_headline: Fingerprinting Those Seeking Food Stamps Is Denounced
headline.seo: Christine C. Quinn Urges City to Drop Rule on Fingerprinting Food-Stamp Seekers
